codetest

Class Events

  • java.lang.Object
    • codetest.EventIndex

  • public class Events
extends java.lang.Object
    Events is the Event Index maintaining the Events available indexed by their location. Events have their id indexed in a two dimentionsal index. Created by rgilham on 11/12/2017.

    • Method Detail

      • findEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> findEvents(Location location,
                                        int distance)
        Gets an ordered list of Events found at the location and within the given distance of the location, ordered by the distance from the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to search from
        distance - the distance from the location to search from, zero = limitless distance.
        Returns:
        an ordered list of Events, ordered by the distance from the location, the nearest event being the first in the list.

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(Event event)
        Add a new Event to the index
        Parameters:
        event - the Event to Add

      • removeEvent

        public void removeEvent(int id)
        Remove the event with the given ID from the index
        Parameters:
        id -

      • getEvent

        public Event getEvent(int id)
        Gets the Event by the event ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the event
        Returns:
        the Event with that id or null if no event with that id exists.

      • getEventAtLocation

        public Event getEventAtLocation(Location location)
        Gets the event at the given location. If an event is located at the given location it is returned, otherwise null is returned.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the event
        Returns:
        the event at that location or null if no event exists at the given location

        public java.util.Collection<Event> getAllEvents()
        Gets all of the events, in no specfic order
        Returns:
